definition: to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish

sentences.english: Peppermint leaves are believed to relieve tiredness and nasal stuffiness.
sentences.chinese: 据信薄荷叶可以减轻疲劳和鼻塞。

sentences.english: We have to recognize it and lessen the impact best we can, " said Gore.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须认清这一点并尽可能减轻其影响，”戈尔说。

sentences.english: Your goal is to mitigate the risks of exploiting vulnerabilities to an acceptable level.
sentences.chinese: 您的目标是将漏洞被利用的风险减轻到可接受的程度。
桂皮可以减轻关节疼痛。

sentences.english: Many of the channel impairments described above can be mitigated on-chip using equalization.
sentences.chinese: 上面提到的信道损害可以在芯片上用均等化来减轻。

sentences.english: The judge said that nothing could mitigate the cruelty with which the mother had treated her child.
sentences.chinese: 法官说，这位母亲虐待孩子，罪行无法减轻。

sentences.english: You may have heard that some foods, because they are difficult to digest, will make you lose weight.
sentences.chinese: 你一定听说过那些难消化所以会使你体重减轻的食品。

sentences.english: This will lighten your spirit and give you strength and motivation.
sentences.chinese: 这样会减轻你的精神压力并会给你能力和动力。

sentences.english: Irritative symptoms lessened with repeated exposures .
sentences.chinese: 刺激症状随着重复暴露而减轻。

sentences.english: The node dry weight in large-spike variety Su200l decreased significantly after leaf removal.
sentences.chinese: 剪叶后大穗型品种宿2001茎秆干重明显减轻。

sentences.english: Also, you can learn how to use reflexology for pain and stress relief.
sentences.chinese: 同样，你可以学习如何使用反射理论减轻痛苦和压力。

sentences.english: Yin recited sutras for the dead donkey's soul, and performed ceremonies to release it from its suffering.
sentences.chinese: 殷为驴子的灵魂念经，还做法事减轻它的痛苦。

sentences.english: It can block and relieve forenamed variety by disbranching vagus nerve and depressor nerve.
sentences.chinese: 切断迷走神经和减压神经可以阻断或减轻上述变化。

sentences.english: If you want to lose weight, here are some dos and don'ts.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想减轻体重，这是一些注意事项。

sentences.english: Non-resistance to the tedium, however, can make it a lot less painful.
sentences.chinese: 不去抵制单调乏味，可以减轻你的痛苦。

sentences.english: Along with the clinical improvement the spongiform pustules vanished, and the inflammation in dermis also lessened.
sentences.chinese: 治疗后表皮内海绵状脓疱消失，真皮炎症有所减轻。

definition: to bring relief/to alleviate (a crisis)/to dull (a pain)
to make heavier/to emphasize/(of an illness etc) to become more serious/to aggravate (a bad situation)/to increase (a burden, punishment etc)
to share (a burden, a cost, a responsibility)
